name: Oven Roasted Breakfast Potatoes
description: These Breakfast Potatoes get perfectly crispy in the oven and are a great addition to breakfast or brunch! Made with simple ingredients and wonderfully seasoned.
recipeIngredient: 1  red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1  green bell pepper, seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Lightly spray a large rimmed pan (or two) with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Lightly spray a large rimmed pan (or two) with oil.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the diced potatoes, onions, bell peppers, garlic, olive oil, smoked paprika and salt. Toss well until they are coated in olive oil.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the diced potatoes, onions, bell peppers, garlic, olive oil, smoked paprika and salt. Toss well until they are coated in olive oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetables to the pan(s) and arrange in an even layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetables to the pan(s) and arrange in an even layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 45-60 minutes, stirring a little every 15 minutes, until the potatoes are golden brown in places. Use a metal spatula to scrape the potatoes from the pan, this will help with any sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 45-60 minutes, stirring a little every 15 minutes, until the potatoes are golden brown in places. Use a metal spatula to scrape the potatoes from the pan, this will help with any sticking.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with additional salt + pepper, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with additional salt + pepper, to taste.
